title: Cowboys Win Easily, Fields’s Rough First Start, and Which 3-0 Teams Do You Believe in?
description:
Jason, James, and Ryan start by discussing the Cowboys' dominant victory on 'Monday Night Football.' (1:30) Then they discuss which 3-0 teams they believe in and whether it’s time to panic on the 1-2 Chiefs and Seahawks (22:36). They talk about the debut of Justin Fields, Aaron Rodgers and the Packers' comeback victory, and when the Steelers should move on from Ben Roethlisberger (37:09). They wrap by previewing Tom Brady’s return to Foxborough on Sunday night against the Patriots (57:16).

Hosts: Jason Goff, James Jones, and Ryan Shazier
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
